akas: Piggy Tales Pigs at Work (second season title)
akas from release info: Piggy Tales Pigs at Work (second season title)

1.title: Scary Fog
1.plot: A curious pig gets more than he bargained for while playing in the fog.

2.title: Holiday Heist
2.plot: Santa and the Thief engage in a battle of wits around the tree.

3.title: Road Hog
3.plot: Two street racing pigs put their pedals to the metal.

4.title: Slingshot Delivery
4.plot: No package is too big for Delivery Pig.

5.title: Bad Signal
5.plot: The wrong pig, in the wrong place, at the right time.

6.title: Hoop and Loop
6.plot: A talented pig has an eye for the net.

7.title: Cops and Robbers
7.plot: In the murky underworld of Pig City, it's hard to tell the good guys from the bad.

8.title: Ghost Hog
8.plot: A curious pig gets more than he bargained for while playing in the fog.

9.title: Hard Days Light
9.plot: In Pig City, a pig's work is never done.

10.title: Branched Out
10.plot: A scared pig needs a hero with head for heights.

11.title: Piggin' String
11.plot: A determined pig comes to the rescue with his rope wrangling skills.

12.title: Pork Brigade
12.plot: Fire Chief fights a mighty blaze but struggles to save himself.

13.title: Getaway Loot
13.plot: A cocky thief becomes too smart for his own good.

14.title: Joyful Jingle
14.plot: A group of resourceful pigs celebrate the festive season in style.

15.title: Happy New Pig
15.plot: Two pigs are determined to bring in the new year with a bang.

16.title: Muffin Master
16.plot: A plucky pig tries to distract an old timer on his lunch break.

17.title: Well Done
17.plot: Some pigs will stop at nothing to get a good sun tan.

18.title: Green and Furious
18.plot: A petrolhead goes to great lengths for a sweet ride.

19.title: Dream Dog
19.plot: A hungry pig places a huge order for a dream dog.

20.title: Dodge and Deliver
20.plot: When it absolutely, positively has to be there on time - Call someone else.

21.title: Pig City Valentine
21.plot: A love story from the streets of Pig City.

22.title: Ramp Champ
22.plot: A tenacious pig will stop at nothing to become the next ramp champ.

23.title: Slam Punk
23.plot: A greedy ball hog gets his comeuppance on court.

24.title: Doorbell Symphony
24.plot: A playful pig turns into a doorbell disk jockey, but not everyone appreciates his talents.

25.title: Getaway Graffiti
25.plot: A sneaky graffiti artist proves too smart for his own art.

26.title: Egg Hunt
26.plot: A hungry pig gets into a pickle while hunting for Easter eggs.

27.title: Light Riders
27.plot: Two workers have a smashing time while fixing the street lights.

28.title: Post no Pigs
28.plot: A worker pig gets into a sticky situation while billposting.

29.title: Snout Invasion
29.plot: The intergalactic explorer returns for revenge, this time it's war.

30.title: Pigs Can Fly
30.plot: It's the end of the show and a happy pig sings off in style.

1.title: Trampoline
1.plot: A curious Piggy comes across a trampoline and can't resist jumping on it -- even though he's not supposed to.

2.title: Roughnecks
2.plot: Get your hard hat ready. Those towers don't build themselves you know, so when a piggy gets his tools mixed up, things don't go according to plan.

3.title: Abduction
3.plot: Take me to your leader. A surprise visit from an intergalactic explorer wipes the smile from one unsuspecting piggy's face.

4.title: Teeter-Trotter
4.plot: Two piggies are playing on a seesaw. They're trying to get it rocking, but one of the pigs is just too big. So how can they get that big piggy up in the air?

5.title: The Hole
5.plot: Where's that breeze coming from? When two piggies come across a mysterious hole in the ground, they throw caution to the wind.

6.title: Push-Button
6.plot: Put a big red button in front of a pig and he'll push it. This little piggy just can't resist pressing it - even though he doesn't know what it does.

7.title: The Mirror
7.plot: Mirror mirror on the wall, who's the porkiest of them all? This little pig enjoys checking himself out - but is he really THAT good looking?

8.title: Super Glue
8.plot: What's green, stupid, and sticky all over? See what happens when one dimwitted pig finds a tube of glue - and just has to pick it up.

9.title: Piggy in the Middle
9.plot: Two piggies are playing with a soccer ball, but when another pig wants to join in they play keep away. When will it be his turn?

10.title: Epic Sir Bucket
10.plot: A bucket makes a perfect helmet for a crusading knight - or at least this playful piggy thinks so. But what's that mysterious thing hanging from that balloon?

11.title: Push Button Trouble
11.plot: Another day, another button. Why can't those pesky piggies just do as they're told? Being curious must be in their DNA.

12.title: Shazam
12.plot: Abracadabra. Pigs really shouldn't mess with magic, but when these two come across a magic wand it leaves them spellbound.

13.title: Puffed Up
13.plot: What happens when you hold your breath? One poor piggy is about to find out.

14.title: Peekaboo!
14.plot: One little piggy wants to play hide and seek, but his porky friend doesn't seem to understand the rules. Or so it seems.

15.title: Up or Down?
15.plot: When a busy little pig calls an elevator, it keeps him waiting - but what's taking so long?

16.title: Gloves
16.plot: Piggies don't have hands. So when they come across a pair of gloves they have no idea what they're for.

17.title: Snooze
17.plot: When a piggy starts snoring, what would a fellow pig do to make him stop? Anything, that's what.

18.title: SuperPork
18.plot: Stop that thief. Will SuperPork and his trusted sidekick save the day? Go SuperPork, go.

19.title: Cake Duel
19.plot: Those hungry hogs love nothing more than pigging out on sweet treats, but what if there's only one slice of cake?

20.title: Dr. Pork, M.D.
20.plot: Dr. Pork is busy seeing some poorly piggies. But one of them gives him a surprise that's out of this world.

21.title: Hog Hoops
21.plot: Join us courtside as one athletic piggy shows off his ball skillz. Hopefully nothing puts him off his aim.

22.title: The Cure
22.plot: When a poor little piggy has a cold, his caring friend really wants to help. Maybe some medicine will make him feel better.

23.title: Up the Tempo
23.plot: What's that sound? Where is it coming from? And why is this piggy's hammer making such funny noises? You'll have to watch to find out.

24.title: Jammed
24.plot: What food do piggies love almost as much as eggs? When a couple of hungry hogs find a jam jar, they'll do anything to get it open.

25.title: Fly Piggy, Fly!
25.plot: Those piggies may not be very smart, but they sure are determined. This inventive piggy just won't give up trying to get his machine up in the air.

26.title: The Game
26.plot: Get ready for a chess master class from two of the "smartest" piggies around. It's the ultimate display of strategy, skill and patience.

27.title: The Catch
27.plot: Ice hole fishing is usually a relaxing hobby. But when an impatient piggy casts his line, there's no telling what's going to be the catch of the day.

28.title: Snowed Up
28.plot: Happy Holidays piglets. Yes, even our favorite porky friends celebrate this festive season by frolicking around in the snow. Just don't confuse the frosty white stuff with ice-cream.

29.title: The Wishing Well
29.plot: You know what they say - be careful what you wish for. Unfortunately for the pigs, being careful is just not in their DNA.

30.title: Stuck In?
30.plot: Though many tried for the sword with all their strength, none could move the sword nor stir it - but do we really want pigs running around with swords anyway?

31.title: It's a Wrap
31.plot: You know that feeling when a super fun party is over and it's time to clean up everything and go home? Well, I guess even piggies can get a bit emotional at times like that.

1.title: Nailed It!
1.plot: Why is it that some nails just don't want to stay hammered in? Piggies find the craziest ways to assure they do.

2.title: Lunch Break
2.plot: Even during a hard earned lunch break on the job site, two eager Piggies lend a helping hand to make another Piggy's work easier.

3.title: Screw Up
3.plot: Two Piggies, whose work must be accomplished suspended in the air by balloons, struggle to remain aloft. They had better come up with solutions fast or they'll screw up.

4.title: Pile Up
4.plot: It seems so simple: build a tower out of crates. What could possibly go wrong!?

5.title: Step 1
5.plot: Assembly required. All it takes is patience and clear instructions. Or maybe not.

6.title: Jackhammered
6.plot: Operating a jackhammer can be a very dangerous occupation. But for whom?

7.title: Race Nut
7.plot: An old race pro declines the help of an enthusiastic young fan - but later regrets it.

8.title: Predicament in Paint
8.plot: A nice, fresh coat of paint on the floor ends up being quite a predicament. But one Pig's mess is another Pig's treasure.

9.title: Get the Hammer
9.plot: Everyone loves a good game show, especially when the Piggies must use their construction expertise to reach that gold hammer as quickly as possible.

10.title: Fabulous Fluke
10.plot: Just when this Piggy gives up hammering in a stubborn nail, he finds the nail has miraculously nailed itself in. Well then - twice must be the charm.

11.title: Magnetic Appeal
11.plot: One must always use the right tool for the job but this time the Piggy's tool is out of reach - until a magnet becomes the most attractive solution.

12.title: Porkatron
12.plot: With a nod to Transformers®, this Piggy finds himself the envy of all when he manages to dump himself into the trash.

13.title: Grand Opening
13.plot: It's the grand opening of a new building, and that warrants an official ceremony.

14.title: Lights Out
14.plot: When a lightbulb burns out at the job-site, the Piggies find out there's a whole new world of fun when the lights go out.

15.title: Tipping Point
15.plot: Keeping calm and staying balanced are key to working on a dangerous job-site. It's too bad Piggies can't do either.

16.title: All Geared Up
16.plot: From the dusty depths of the Piggy Tales archives, a film has surfaced into modern times, revealing how the Piggies worked at the factory in the 1920's.

17.title: Dream House
17.plot: A Piggy seems to be having trouble communicating the house of his dreams to his Piggy Builder.

18.title: Home Sweet Home
18.plot: When a Piggy makes a few adjustments to his architectural drawings, he can finally build the best house he could've ever imagined.

19.title: Mind the Gap
19.plot: When two Piggies are separated by a mighty gap, they build a wonderful bridge. But "wonderful" is a matter of perspective.

20.title: Unhinged
20.plot: Construction Piggy becomes unhinged when he fails to open his lunch box. It's a good thing he has a helping friend that finds a solution to his problem.

21.title: Sticky Situation
21.plot: Here we have a resourceful Piggy who manages to get out of one very sticky situation, but does it really get any better for him?

22.title: Final Exam
22.plot: To be permitted to work at a construction site, one little Piggy must be tested rigorously to demonstrate his skills. Will he pass or fail?

23.title: Three Little Piggies
23.plot: The story of the Three Little Pigs re- interpreted, Piggy Tales style. It's nothing to sneeze at.

25.title: Demohogs
25.plot: In order to build the perfect garden, two Piggies must first remove an unforeseen obstacle. It's nothing a few explosives won't take care of.

26.title: Swine Symphony
26.plot: One Pig's noise is another Pig's music, revealing the Symphony that plays inside Tenor Pig's head.

0.title: Wrong Floor
0.plot: The show is about to begin in the piggy theater, what floor was it on again?

1.title: Bouncing Buffoon
1.plot: A prancing pig performs a balloon dance with the grace of a king, or a tramp.

2.title: Up the Ladder
2.plot: Keeping the lights on at the piggy theater is not as simple as it seems.

3.title: Sharpest Shooter
3.plot: A classic competition of sharpshooting prowess from a trio of not-so-sharp shooters.

4.title: Snack Time
4.plot: The age old struggle of pig vs machine.

5.title: Batter Up
5.plot: All the pigs flip for this master baker's famous pancakes.

6.title: Magic Matchup
6.plot: Magic shows are not typically considered competitive events - for a reason.

7.title: The Bubble Trick
7.plot: This pig is so proud of his party trick - no one can burst his bubble.

8.title: Piggy Dive
8.plot: A frightened pig must overcome his fear to compete at the highest level.

9.title: One Big Hurdle
9.plot: A competitive pig must dig deep to make the winning jump.

10.title: Piggy Vaulting
10.plot: The higher the jump, the harder the fall.

11.title: Art School
11.plot: For this pig, the creative process is not so straightforward.

12.title: Chalk It Up
12.plot: There are two sides to every fight.

13.title: School's Up
13.plot: Sometimes you just need a little help from a friend.

14.title: Broken Chair
14.plot: Give it up for the unsung heroes of the piggy theater. There's almost nothing they can't fix.

15.title: Hidden Talent
15.plot: A pig unexpectedly gets his time in the spotlight.

16.title: Hiccups
16.plot: Hamlet suffers from a bad case of the hiccups.

17.title: Let's Tango
17.plot: Tango pig struggles to dance with a clumsy partner.

18.title: Scared Sick
18.plot: Vampire Pig is hungry but his flu is the biggest monster of all.

19.title: Shadow Pig
19.plot: While two pigs struggle to impress an audience, a hidden talent lurks deep in the shadows.

20.title: Pumpkin Head
20.plot: Two pigs gets stuck into the spirit of Halloween.

21.title: For Pig's Sake
21.plot: Best seat in the house - if it weren't for the other pigs.

22.title: Remote Pig
22.plot: Pigbot malfunctions and his master struggles to fix him.

23.title: Pig Interrupted
23.plot: Dropping the mic is not always a good thing.

24.title: Light Dance
24.plot: The pigs kick off the show with an impressive performance, but something's not quite right.

25.title: Pig Expectations
25.plot: A jealous pig gets his comeuppance when he tries to swap presents.

26.title: Gift Wrapped
26.plot: A festive pig gets into a sticky situation while wrapping a present.

27.title: Holiday Song
27.plot: It's Christmas Eve and Angel Pig gets into a tangle by the tree.

28.title: Lost Piggy
28.plot: These clueless pigs are in desperate need of some stage directions.

29.title: The Mime
29.plot: Mime Pig meets his match with a plucky member of the audience.

30.title: Snout on the Wall
30.plot: Some pigs wish they could just blend into the background.

31.title: Re-Abduction
31.plot: The intergalactic explorer returns but gets more than he bargained for with Janitor Pig.

32.title: Ball Games
32.plot: A Pig struggles to rehearse for his play, practice makes perfect.

33.title: Slip Up
33.plot: An unsuspecting Pig performs a slippery act.

34.title: Final Curtain
34.plot: It's the end of the show and Janitor Pig puts on a final performance.

imdb.title: Piggy Tales
plot: A cartoon series of green cartoon piggies.
